metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17523 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: lilypond-invoke-editor in LilyPond 2.19.80 does not validate strings beforelaunching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, whichallows remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a craftedURL, as demonstrated by a --proxy-pac-file argument.

criterions.comment: lilypond package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
